issues.description: The problem statement’s UML and text specify that Milkable.messageOnMilk() returns boolean, but the solution defines messageOnMilk() to return String. This mismatch will confuse students about the correct return type for the Milkable interface and the method implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the specification and implementation by updating the problem statement and UML so that messageOnMilk() returns String (and describes the milking result), or alternatively change the solution’s messageOnMilk() to return boolean if boolean is the intended design.
